title: Fusion Organization looking for People to Join
body:
We are Team Fusion we currently have 3 teams that are all fairly high level. We have a desire to try to grow our organization. We have many ideas that have a lot of potential. We want to make a website and a youtube channel. We have a lot of potential with the teams. We are trying to grow our youtube channel, production team, as well as our teams.

We currently have coach's for every team (except blue team), need to replace

We have very high elo players which include (High diamond, Challenger)

DONT NEED PLAYERS

WE NEED Video Editor, Website Designers, Editors, and Analysts

Thanks your for reading all of this if your interested please add me ign: Fsn SammyWammy
or
Leave a comment so i can get back to you :)

replies.body: Hey i was that editor seeking the job, did you kick me becuease i dont have a mike? i will get one soon.
